title: Regular AR Verbs
rules: for nosotros, present and preterite are the same
subjunctive is present with an e
imperfect: yo and nosotros are the same
list: pasar, quedar (remain), hablar, llevar (bring), dejar (abandon), llamar, tomar (take a drink), tratar (treat), mirar (look at), esperar, entrar, trabajar, terminar, necesitar (require), resultar, cambiar, presentar, crear, considerar, acabar (finish), ganar (gain), formar, aceptar, lograr (attain), estudiar, preguntar, ayudar, gustar (please), escuchar (listen), levantar (to get up), intentar (attempt), usar, olvidar (forget), ocupar, fijar (to fasten), comprar (buy), evitar (avoid), interesar, echar (to fling), importar, observar, imaginar, desarrollar (to develop), señalar (to indicate), preparar, faltar (to lack), acompañar, desear (desire), enseñar (to teach), representar, mandar (to give an order), asegurar (to secure), matar (to kill), guardar, iniciar, bajar (to lower), notar, cortar (to cut), aprovechar (to take advantage of), apoyar (to support), aumentar (to increase), abandonar, expresar

present-subjunctive-o-to-ue-when-accente: encontrar, contar, recordar, mostrar, demonstrar, acordar (to decide, acordarse = to remember), costar
preteriteYo-subjunctive-z-to-c-before-e: realizar, alcanzar (to reach, catch up), utilizar, lanzar, avanzar
preteriteYo-and-subjunctive-c-to-qu-befo: buscar, sacar, explicar, tocar, acercar (to approach), dedicar, indicar, significar, collocar (to locate), aplicar

title: Regular ER Verbs
list: deber, comprender, correr, comer, suceder, aprender, responder, vender, meter, pretender, corresponder, depender, recorrer (to travel), ejercer, proteger

title: Regular IR Verbs
list: vivir, existir, occurir, permitir, recibir, partir, cumplir (to carry out), decidir, subir (to go up), sufrir (to experience), compartir (to divide up), consistir, insistir, asistir, discutir, definir, unir, coincidir (to agree), distinguir, admitir, acudir (to attend)

rule: i to ie when accented and z to c before e
add u to preterite first-person, and 6x subjunctive
